mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news(ID, TITLE, PREVIEW, DATE, IMAGE, LINK, PROVIDER, READCNT) VALUES(#{newsID}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsPreview}, #{newsDate}, #{newsImage}, #{newsLink}, #{newsProvider}, 0);
